tool_description: This API creates (and host) thumbnails from images. Resize by width, height and crop to create squares.
name: rethumb
title: rethumb

api_list.name: Width
api_list.description: Resize the image based on the specified width.

required_parameters.name: pixels
required_parameters.description: Width of the thumbnail in pixels.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: URL of the image to process.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rethumb.p.rapidapi.com/width/128/http://factor45.org/images/beach.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rethumb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rethumb.p.rapidapi.com/width/{pixels}/{image}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rethumb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Square
api_list.description: Create a square image based on the specified size.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: URL of the image to process.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rethumb.p.rapidapi.com/square/128/http://factor45.org/images/beach.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rethumb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
